attributes.action: stop these telecommunication monopoles with antennae
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the public think that erecting these phone masks outside peoples homes and there bedroom windows should be stopped, they should be place in proper areas at there expense not at other peoples emissary,

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/PhoneMasts/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
